views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10, 11 and 12

BlurTouchClean gives you the visual option to Hide the Blur on the 3D Touch Supported Devices.

The Tweak also changes the 3D Touch Opening/Closing Animations in a more pleasant Way.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, i hope you like it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.8 - Added the option to Hide the Separator Lines from 3D Touch Menus (Thanks No3DLines by my Friend @MTAC8). Version 1.0.7
- Added support for iOS 12 and arm64e/A12.
Version 1.0.6
- Added the option to Hide the 3D Menus Window.
Version 1.0.5
- Tested and Working Fine also on iOS 11 (Download Enabled).
- Improvements.
Version 1.0.4
- Added the option to make Blu the Icons Images on Touch Menu.
- Added the option to Hide the Highlights on Touch Menu.
- Added the option to Hide the Haptic Feedback and Highlights on Touch Menu.
Version 1.0.3
- Added the option to Hide the Text Labels on the 3D Touch Menu.


Version 1.0.2
- Added the option to auto dismiss the 3D Touch Menu on Release (thanks so much @fidel3007 for the Code).
- Small Change in the Settings Panel.
- Code Cleanup.
